text:
Hey everyone! Happy thursday! If you are looking to spread a little HubSpot :heart: today, I have a few users who would love your help!

This user is looking to filter down their blog results to one blog:
Blog content: <https://community.HubSpot.com/t5/CMS-Development/HubSpot-related-post-filtering-also-loading-posts-from-from-two/m-p/252307>

If you're interested in helping someone with their custom module lightbox, click here: <https://community.HubSpot.com/t5/CMS-Development/Custom-Module-Lightbox-Gallery-Not-Showing-Close-Link/m-p/252753>

Any suggestions, tips or tricks would be greatly appreciated! :slightly_smiling_face:
yea… truth is the `related_blog_posts` hubl doesn’t work as it should
The tags and blog IDs increase the relevancy of posts matching those things but you cannot exclude and the path attribute doesn’t actually seem to work

We used it once somewhere and had to resort to some crazy hacks to get it to work the way we expected it should.

IMHO it should probably get compeletely overhauled or scrapped and replaced with a function - a function would be significantly more useful.
Always appreciate honest feedback! I will definitely pass the information along to some folks on my end to see what their thoughts are! Really appreciate you taking a look! :grinning:
feel free to reach out if the HS devs have questions. I and Gonzalo also detailed our thoughts on it in <#CBXTNHPEZ|related-posts-module>
Another user trying to build their first custom module looking for any tips or tricks from the pros: <https://community.HubSpot.com/t5/CMS-Development/Repeating-Linked-Images-in-Email/m-p/252810>
